--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> He knew they were right. He had to be strong. They were faceing many
evils at this time. The plague, Hydras, Tripredacus and now and evil
Prime.
> Rodimus gets back to his feet.
> Rodimus Prime: I just recieved a comm message from Ultra Magnus. A
new change has happened on Cybertron. The Tripredacus rebuilt Optimus
Prime in an evil form. He has already taken over Cybertron, and he is
comeing here...

"If he's coming by ship maybe we can build some kind of ground to
space weapon relay, probably some kind of energy ray, or laser beam.
We could use it to detonate his ship before it reaches the planet and
hope he is either stranded in space or burnt up entering the
atmosphere." Kenzo stated.
